news.title: Meta  ( META )  Beats Earnings Estimates and Announces First Ever Dividend is it Time to Buy?
news.content: Investors walked away from the busy investment week with a lot of news to digest including Meta Platforms (META) announcing its first-ever dividend after comfortably surpassing Q4 top and bottom-line expectations on Thursday.

news.title: S&P 500 Hits High In Stock Picker's Market; Five New Buys

news.title: Stock Market Today: Stocks Swing Higher on Meta Earnings Excitement
news.content: It was a dizzying end of the week for market participants. Stocks had a slow start Friday thanks to a good-news-is-bad-news jobs report. However, the main indexes eventually turned tail and rallied hard on the back of well-received earnings from a pair of Big Tech giants.
